name: The God Of Death
description:
What do you believe is the best and simplest way to destroy the whole world? Nuclear missiles? Bioweapons? Wars? No. These answers are all wrong.

Why? Because people fight back bravely when they know that they are about to die, which is why they always survive. Therefore, to destroy this planet, you have to find a way that drops their guard and undermines the world secretly. And when people realize the problems they are facing, it will be too late for them to handle or escape.

So what is that best way? Well, this game will provide you with a solid answer. Don't miss out, because it's possible that the same story is going on in the real world right now and you are still not aware of it.
